abstract: resolute energy corporation shares bought by russell investments group ltd. .
article: russell investments group ltd. . boosted its stake in shares of resolute energy corporation by 106.8 % in the third quarter , according to its most recent disclosure with the sec . the firm owned 65,392 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock after acquiring an additional 33,775 shares during the period . russell investments group ltd. . owned about 0.29 % of resolute energy worth $ 1,942,000 at the end of the most recent quarter . other large investors also recently bought and sold shares of the company . legal & general group plc acquired a new position in resolute energy during the second quarter worth $ 168,000 .

bank of america corp de grew its holdings in shares of resolute energy by 799.4 % during the first quarter . bank of america corp de now owns 4,803 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 194,000 after buying an additional 4,269 shares in the last quarter . parametric portfolio associates llc grew its holdings in shares of resolute energy by 6.7 % during the second quarter . parametric portfolio associates llc now owns 7,507 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 223,000 after buying an additional 470 shares in the last quarter .

ubs asset management americas inc. . grew its holdings in shares of resolute energy by 63.0 % during the second quarter . ubs asset management americas inc. . now owns 8,800 shares of the oil and gas exploration company 's stock worth $ 262,000 after buying an additional 3,400 shares in the last quarter . finally , dynamic technology lab private ltd purchased a new stake in shares of resolute energy during the second quarter worth $ 285,000 . institutional investors own 97.76 % of the company 's stock . shares of resolute energy corporation opened at $ 30.02 on friday .

resolute energy corporation has a 1-year low of $ 23.64 and a 1-year high of $ 49.14 . the stock has a market cap of $ 675.57 , a price-to-earnings ratio of -22.07 and a beta of 3.43 . the company has a current ratio of 0.42 , a quick ratio of 0.42 and a debt-to-equity ratio of -8.75 . resolute energy last announced its quarterly earnings data on monday , november 6th . the oil and gas exploration company reported $ 0.15 earnings per share for the quarter , missing the zacks ' consensus estimate of $ 0.36 by .

the company had revenue of $ 81.60 million for the quarter , compared to analysts ' expectations of $ 86.76 million . during the same period in the prior year , the company earned earnings per share . the company 's revenue for the quarter was up 72.2 % compared to the same quarter last year . equities research analysts forecast that resolute energy corporation will post 0.6 eps for the current fiscal year . in related news , director james e. duffy sold 1,000 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated monday , december 11th .

the shares were sold at an average price of $ 27.69 , for a total value of $ 27,690.00 . the sale was disclosed in a document filed with the securities & exchange commission , which is available at this link . also , insider nicholas j. sutton sold 9,999 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated monday , december 18th . the shares were sold at an average price of $ 27.29 , for a total transaction of $ 272,872.71 . the disclosure for this sale can be found here . insiders sold 19,499 shares of company stock valued at $ 542,678 in the last three months .

7.30 % of the stock is currently owned by insiders . a number of equities research analysts have recently issued reports on the stock . klr group reaffirmed a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 64.00 target price on shares of resolute energy in a report on friday , september 15th . barclays reaffirmed an `` overweight '' rating and set a $ 37.00 target price on shares of resolute energy in a report on monday , november 20th . northland securities set a $ 50.00 target price on shares of resolute energy and gave the stock a `` buy '' rating in a report on thursday , november 16th .

valuengine lowered shares of resolute energy from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a report on wednesday , september 6th . finally , bmo capital markets lowered shares of resolute energy from an `` outperform '' rating to a `` market perform '' rating and set a $ 35.00 target price for the company . in a report on monday , september 18th . they noted that the move was a valuation call . two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , two have given a hold rating and six have issued a buy rating to the company 's stock .
